about_the_game:
Reviews

"3D Don't Die, Mr Robot! is a ridiculously-playable arcade game that feels great whether just making things explode or chasing after a new score for the leaderboard, perfect for a moment's break or digging in to a proper high-score run." 

4.5/5 - HardcoreGamer 

"3D Don’t Die Mr Robot brings the classic arcade-style high score chase to a new dimension. It's simple to understand and accessible to all ages, but the challenges will be tough for even the most seasoned of arcade game fans."

9/10 - TheSixthAxis

"Arcade perfection is found in this fast-paced risk vs reward dodge-em-up, then bomb-em-up. A cult classic in waiting - don't sleep on this indie game sensation."

9/10 -  Higher Plain Games

Features

  • Fast-paced, arcade-style gameplay

  • Addictive scoring system

  • Online Leaderboards

  • Visual overload bliss

  • Heart pounding soundtrack

  • Simple to pick up, hard to put down

  • Endless replayability

10 years in the making - a legend is reborn.

3D Don't Die, Mr. Robot! is a fast-paced, arcade-style collect-'em-up where you play as Mr. Robot, a little robot who is trapped in a highly dangerous and rather fruity dimension called the Neon Dunjun. The only way to survive is to collect fruits which will explode on contact, destroying any enemies in their blast radius, helping Mr. Robot to cheat death for a few more moments. To assist him further, exploding fruits set off a chain reaction, causing other fruit to explode - filling the screen with destruction and more importantly, POINTS!

3DDMR is a reboot of our PC, iOS and Console cult hit "Don't Die, Mr. Robot!" with a whole new dimension of delights! There's REMIX MODE with it's hand made challenges, ARCADE MODE with it's high-scoring but mind melting purity, and of course LIME ATTACK MODE with, well... Limes. And of course, plenty of global leaderboards for all the modes to compete in.

3DDMR is simple to pick up and play, but difficult to master. The controls are easy to learn, but the game is fast-paced and requires becoming in tune with your primal reflexes. You'll need to use all of your zen-twitch-zone to dodge enemies, collect fruit, and survive as long as possible to help Mr. Robot escape the Neon Dunjun in one piece!

Use coins you've collected in all the game modes to unlock fancy things for Mr. Robot to wear like shades, hats, shoes and body paint. Make your replays as individual as your play style!

More commendations

"The soundtrack is killer" - arquivosdowoo

"A ton of depth and even more replayability" - GertLushGaming

"I very rarely love a game I've reviewed but this one took me back to my childhood and I re-lived some magical gaming memories." - GamerPauly

A Message from Team ISG

Thanks for checking out our game! It's taken us 10 years but we finally did a sequel to our breakthrough console game "Don't Die, Mr. Robot!". We think we've done the original proud and improved on it in every way possible. It's really been a labour of love and we hope you have as much fun playing this as we had making it.

Much love and see you on the leaderboards.

Charlie & Mike

name: 3D Don't Die Mr Robot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or equivalent.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or equivalent.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Fresh from the Neon Dunjun, Mr. Robot returns in the third dimension! A heart pounding bullet hell dodge 'em up from veteran arcade developers Infinite State Games
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
